summary: An ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2475, for improvement of 23rd Avenue West from Plymouth Street to Thorndyke Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing bridge roadways where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage,; under Ordinance No. 26824 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
